title: Serif font use in Boat-Mag
content:
Hi

Fall in love with this really pretty serif fonts use in here [www.boat-mag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134048/http:/www.boat-mag.com/ "www.boat-mag.com").  
I hope someone can help me to found out what's the name.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134048im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-12-02%20at%2010_4464.57.08%20AM.png)

Thank you :)

Font: 

 Freight Big Pro Light
